00016 /*       ========================================================= */
00017 /*       Purpose: This program computes the parabolic cylinder */
00018 /*                functions Dv(x) and their derivatives using */
00019 /*                subroutine PBDV */
00020 /*       Input:   x --- Argument of Dv(x) */
00021 /*                v --- Order of Dv(x) */
00022 /*       Output:  DV(na) --- Dn+v0(x) */
00023 /*                DP(na) --- Dn+v0'(x) */
00024 /*                ( na = |n|, n = int(v), v0 = v-n, |v0| < 1 */
00025 /*                  n = 0,ס1,ס2,תתת, |n| ף 100 ) */
00026 /*                PDF --- Dv(x) */
00027 /*                PDD --- Dv'(x) */
00028 /*       Example: v = 5.5,  x =10.0,  v0 = 0.5,  n = 0,1,...,5 */
00029 
00030 /*                  n+v0      Dv(x)           Dv'(x) */
00031 /*                --------------------------------------- */
00032 /*                  0.5   .43971930D-10  -.21767183D-09 */
00033 /*                  1.5   .43753148D-09  -.21216995D-08 */
00034 /*                  2.5   .43093569D-08  -.20452956D-07 */
00035 /*                  3.5   .41999741D-07  -.19491595D-06 */
00036 /*                  4.5   .40491466D-06  -.18355745D-05 */
00037 /*                  5.5   .38601477D-05  -.17073708D-04 */
00038 
00039 /*                Dv(x)= .38601477D-05,  Dv'(x)=-.17073708D-04 */
00040 /*       ========================================================= */
00041 /*       FORTRAN code by Jianming Jin, Department of Electrical and */
00042 /*       Computer Engineering, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign */
00043 /*       http://jin.ece.uiuc.edu/routines/mpbdv.for */
00044 /*       Downloaded and converted to C using f2c by */
00045 /*       S. Greilich, Risoe National Laboratory, Denmark */
00046 /*       Reworked as subroutine for SGParticle.dll, abandoning */
00047 /*       f2c.h and libf2c.lib */
00048 /*       ========================================================= */
00049 
00050 /* mpbdv.f -- translated by f2c (version 20060506).*/
00051 
00052 /* Table of constant values */
00053

00055 //static int c__1 = 1;
00056 //static int c__5 = 5;
00057 static double c_b31 = 1.;
00058 static double c_b40 = 2.;

00060 void SGP_Dyx(   double* y,      double* x,      double* Dyx)
00061 {
00062     /* Local variables */
00063 //    static int na;
00064     static double dp[101], dv[101];
00065     static double pdd, pdf;
00066     extern /* Subroutine */ int pbdv_(double *, double *, double *
00067             , double *, double *, double *);
00068 
00069     pbdv_(y, x, dv, dp, &pdf, &pdd);
00070 
00071         *Dyx    =       pdf;
00072 }
00073 
00074 void SGP_fDyx(  float*  fy,     float*  fx,     float*  fDyx)
00075 {
00076         double  y, x, Dyx;
00077         y       = (double)*fy;
00078         x       = (double)*fx;
00079 
00080         SGP_Dyx(        &y, &x, &Dyx);
00081 
00082         *fDyx   = Dyx;
00083 }

00086 double d_sign(double *a, double *b)
00087 {
00088         double x;
00089         x = (*a >= 0 ? *a : - *a);
00090         return( *b >= 0 ? x : -x);
00091 }

00094 int pbdv_(double *v, double *x, double *dv,
00095         double *dp, double *pdf, double *pdd)
00096 {
00097     /* System generated locals */
00098     int i__1;
00099 
00100     /* Local variables */
00101     static double f;
00102     static int k, l, m;
00103     static double f0, f1, s0, v0, v1, v2;
00104     static int ja, na;
00105     static double ep, pd, xa;
00106     static int nk;
00107     static double vh;
00108     static int nv;
00109     static double pd0, pd1;
00110     extern /* Subroutine */ int dvla_(double *, double *, double *
00111             ), dvsa_(double *, double *, double *);
00112 
00113 
00114 /*       ==================================================== */
00115 /*       Purpose: Compute parabolic cylinder functions Dv(x) */
00116 /*                and their derivatives */
00117 /*       Input:   x --- Argument of Dv(x) */
00118 /*                v --- Order of Dv(x) */
00119 /*       Output:  DV(na) --- Dn+v0(x) */
00120 /*                DP(na) --- Dn+v0'(x) */
00121 /*                ( na = |n|, v0 = v-n, |v0| < 1, */
00122 /*                  n = 0,ס1,ס2,תתת ) */
00123 /*                PDF --- Dv(x) */
00124 /*                PDD --- Dv'(x) */
00125 /*       Routines called: */
00126 /*             (1) DVSA for computing Dv(x) for small |x| */
00127 /*             (2) DVLA for computing Dv(x) for large |x| */
00128 /*       ==================================================== */
00129 
00130     xa = fabs(*x);
00131     vh = *v;
00132     *v += d_sign(&c_b31, v);
00133     nv = (int) (*v);
00134     v0 = *v - nv;
00135     na = abs(nv);
00136     ep = exp(*x * -.25 * *x);
00137     if (na >= 1) {
00138         ja = 1;
00139     }
00140     if (*v >= 0.f) {
00141         if (v0 == 0.f) {
00142             pd0 = ep;
00143             pd1 = *x * ep;
00144         } else {
00145             i__1 = ja;
00146             for (l = 0; l <= i__1; ++l) {
00147                 v1 = v0 + l;
00148                 if (xa <= 5.8f) {
00149                     dvsa_(&v1, x, &pd1);
00150                 }
00151                 if (xa > 5.8f) {
00152                     dvla_(&v1, x, &pd1);
00153                 }
00154                 if (l == 0) {
00155                     pd0 = pd1;
00156                 }
00157 /* L10: */
00158             }
00159         }
00160         dv[0] = pd0;
00161         dv[1] = pd1;
00162         i__1 = na;
00163         for (k = 2; k <= i__1; ++k) {
00164             *pdf = *x * pd1 - (k + v0 - 1.) * pd0;
00165             dv[k] = *pdf;
00166             pd0 = pd1;
00167 /* L15: */
00168             pd1 = *pdf;
00169         }
00170     } else {
00171         if (*x <= 0.f) {
00172             if (xa <= 5.8) {
00173                 dvsa_(&v0, x, &pd0);
00174                 v1 = v0 - 1.;
00175                 dvsa_(&v1, x, &pd1);
00176             } else {
00177                 dvla_(&v0, x, &pd0);
00178                 v1 = v0 - 1.;
00179                 dvla_(&v1, x, &pd1);
00180             }
00181             dv[0] = pd0;
00182             dv[1] = pd1;
00183             i__1 = na;
00184             for (k = 2; k <= i__1; ++k) {
00185                 pd = (-(*x) * pd1 + pd0) / (k - 1. - v0);
00186                 dv[k] = pd;
00187                 pd0 = pd1;
00188 /* L20: */
00189                 pd1 = pd;
00190             }
00191         } else if (*x <= 2.f) {
00192             v2 = nv + v0;
00193             if (nv == 0) {
00194                 v2 += -1.;
00195             }
00196             nk = (int) (-v2);
00197             dvsa_(&v2, x, &f1);
00198             v1 = v2 + 1.;
00199             dvsa_(&v1, x, &f0);
00200             dv[nk] = f1;
00201             dv[nk - 1] = f0;
00202             for (k = nk - 2; k >= 0; --k) {
00203                 f = *x * f0 + (k - v0 + 1.) * f1;
00204                 dv[k] = f;
00205                 f1 = f0;
00206 /* L25: */
00207                 f0 = f;
00208             }
00209         } else {
00210             if (xa <= 5.8f) {
00211                 dvsa_(&v0, x, &pd0);
00212             }
00213             if (xa > 5.8f) {
00214                 dvla_(&v0, x, &pd0);
00215             }
00216             dv[0] = pd0;
00217             m = na + 100;
00218             f1 = 0.;
00219             f0 = 1e-30;
00220             for (k = m; k >= 0; --k) {
00221                 f = *x * f0 + (k - v0 + 1.) * f1;
00222                 if (k <= na) {
00223                     dv[k] = f;
00224                 }
00225                 f1 = f0;
00226 /* L30: */
00227                 f0 = f;
00228             }
00229             s0 = pd0 / f;
00230             i__1 = na;
00231             for (k = 0; k <= i__1; ++k) {
00232 /* L35: */
00233                 dv[k] = s0 * dv[k];
00234             }
00235         }
00236     }
00237     i__1 = na - 1;
00238     for (k = 0; k <= i__1; ++k) {
00239         v1 = fabs(v0) + k;
00240         if (*v >= 0.) {
00241             dp[k] = *x * .5 * dv[k] - dv[k + 1];
00242         } else {
00243             dp[k] = *x * -.5 * dv[k] - v1 * dv[k + 1];
00244         }
00245 /* L40: */
00246     }
00247     *pdf = dv[na - 1];
00248     *pdd = dp[na - 1];
00249     *v = vh;
00250     return 0;
00251 } /* pbdv_ */

00253 int dvsa_(double *va, double *x, double *pd)
00254 {
00255     /* System generated locals */
00256     double d__1;
00257 
00258     /* Local variables */
00259     static int m;
00260     static double r__, a0, g0, g1, r1, ep, gm, pi, vm, vt, ga0, va0, sq2,
00261             eps;
00262     extern /* Subroutine */ int gamma_(double *, double *);
00263 
00264 
00265 /*       =================================================== */
00266 /*       Purpose: Compute parabolic cylinder function Dv(x) */
00267 /*                for small argument */
00268 /*       Input:   x  --- Argument */
00269 /*                va --- Order */
00270 /*       Output:  PD --- Dv(x) */
00271 /*       Routine called: GAMMA for computing ג(x) */
00272 /*       =================================================== */
00273 
00274     eps = 1e-15;
00275     pi = 3.141592653589793;
00276     sq2 = sqrt(2.);
00277     ep = exp(*x * -.25 * *x);
00278     va0 = (1. - *va) * .5;
00279     if (*va == 0.f) {
00280         *pd = ep;
00281     } else {
00282         if (*x == 0.f) {
00283             if (va0 <= 0.f && va0 == (double) ((int) va0)) {
00284                 *pd = 0.;
00285             } else {
00286                 gamma_(&va0, &ga0);
00287                 d__1 = *va * -.5;
00288                 *pd = sqrt(pi) / (pow(c_b40, d__1) * ga0);
00289             }
00290         } else {
00291             d__1 = -(*va);
00292             gamma_(&d__1, &g1);
00293             d__1 = *va * -.5 - 1.;
00294             a0 = pow(c_b40, d__1) * ep / g1;
00295             vt = *va * -.5;
00296             gamma_(&vt, &g0);
00297             *pd = g0;
00298             r__ = 1.;
00299             for (m = 1; m <= 250; ++m) {
00300                 vm = (m - *va) * .5;
00301                 gamma_(&vm, &gm);
00302                 r__ = -r__ * sq2 * *x / m;
00303                 r1 = gm * r__;
00304                 *pd += r1;
00305                 if (fabs(r1) < fabs(*pd) * eps) {
00306                     goto L15;
00307                 }
00308 /* L10: */
00309             }
00310 L15:
00311             *pd = a0 * *pd;
00312         }
00313     }
00314     return 0;
00315 } /* dvsa_ */

00317 int dvla_(double *va, double *x, double *pd)
00318 {
00319     /* System generated locals */
00320     double d__1;
00321 
00322      /* Local variables */
00323     static int k;
00324     static double r__, a0, x1, gl, ep, pi, vl, eps;
00325     extern /* Subroutine */ int vvla_(double *, double *, double *
00326             ), gamma_(double *, double *);
00327 
00328 
00329 /*       ==================================================== */
00330 /*       Purpose: Compute parabolic cylinder functions Dv(x) */
00331 /*                for large argument */
00332 /*       Input:   x  --- Argument */
00333 /*                va --- Order */
00334 /*       Output:  PD --- Dv(x) */
00335 /*       Routines called: */
00336 /*             (1) VVLA for computing Vv(x) for large |x| */
00337 /*             (2) GAMMA for computing ג(x) */
00338 /*       ==================================================== */
00339 
00340     pi = 3.141592653589793;
00341     eps = 1e-12;
00342     ep = exp(*x * -.25f * *x);
00343     d__1 = fabs(*x);
00344     a0 = pow(d__1, *va) * ep;
00345     r__ = 1.;
00346     *pd = 1.;
00347     for (k = 1; k <= 16; ++k) {
00348         r__ = r__ * -.5 * (k * 2.f - *va - 1.f) * (k * 2.f - *va - 2.f) / (k *
00349                  *x * *x);
00350         *pd += r__;
00351         if ((d__1 = r__ / *pd, fabs(d__1)) < eps) {
00352             goto L15;
00353         }
00354 /* L10: */
00355     }
00356 L15:
00357     *pd = a0 * *pd;
00358     if (*x < 0.) {
00359         x1 = -(*x);
00360         vvla_(va, &x1, &vl);
00361         d__1 = -(*va);
00362         gamma_(&d__1, &gl);
00363         *pd = pi * vl / gl + cos(pi * *va) * *pd;
00364     }
00365     return 0;
00366 } /* dvla_ */

00368 int vvla_(double *va, double *x, double *pv)
00369 {
00370     /* System generated locals */
00371     double d__1, d__2;
00372 
00373     /* Local variables */
00374     static int k;
00375     static double r__, a0, x1, gl, qe, pi, pdl, dsl, eps;
00376     extern /* Subroutine */ int dvla_(double *, double *, double *
00377             ), gamma_(double *, double *);
00378 
00379 
00380 /*       =================================================== */
00381 /*       Purpose: Compute parabolic cylinder function Vv(x) */
00382 /*                for large argument */
00383 /*       Input:   x  --- Argument */
00384 /*                va --- Order */
00385 /*       Output:  PV --- Vv(x) */
00386 /*       Routines called: */
00387 /*             (1) DVLA for computing Dv(x) for large |x| */
00388 /*             (2) GAMMA for computing ג(x) */
00389 /*       =================================================== */
00390 
00391     pi = 3.141592653589793;
00392     eps = 1e-12;
00393     qe = exp(*x * .25f * *x);
00394     d__1 = fabs(*x);
00395     d__2 = -(*va) - 1.;
00396     a0 = pow(d__1, d__2) * sqrt(2. / pi) * qe;
00397     r__ = 1.;
00398     *pv = 1.;
00399     for (k = 1; k <= 18; ++k) {
00400         r__ = r__ * .5 * (k * 2.f + *va - 1.f) * (k * 2.f + *va) / (k * *x * *
00401                 x);
00402         *pv += r__;
00403         if ((d__1 = r__ / *pv, fabs(d__1)) < eps) {
00404             goto L15;
00405         }
00406 /* L10: */
00407     }
00408 L15:
00409     *pv = a0 * *pv;
00410     if (*x < 0.) {
00411         x1 = -(*x);
00412         dvla_(va, &x1, &pdl);
00413         d__1 = -(*va);
00414         gamma_(&d__1, &gl);
00415         dsl = sin(pi * *va) * sin(pi * *va);
00416         *pv = dsl * gl / pi * pdl - cos(pi * *va) * *pv;
00417     }
00418     return 0;
00419 } /* vvla_ */

00421 int gamma_(double *x, double *ga)
00422 {
00423     /* Initialized data */
00424     static double g[26] = { 1.,.5772156649015329,-.6558780715202538,
00425             -.0420026350340952,.1665386113822915,-.0421977345555443,
00426             -.009621971527877,.007218943246663,-.0011651675918591,
00427             -2.152416741149e-4,1.280502823882e-4,-2.01348547807e-5,
00428             -1.2504934821e-6,1.133027232e-6,-2.056338417e-7,6.116095e-9,
00429             5.0020075e-9,-1.1812746e-9,1.043427e-10,7.7823e-12,-3.6968e-12,
00430             5.1e-13,-2.06e-14,-5.4e-15,1.4e-15,1e-16 };
00431 
00432     /* System generated locals */
00433     int i__1;
00434 
00435     /* Local variables */
00436     static int k, m;
00437     static double r__, z__;
00438     static int m1;
00439     static double pi, gr;
00440 
00441 
00442 /*       ================================================== */
00443 /*       Purpose: Compute gamma function ג(x) */
00444 /*       Input :  x  --- Argument of ג(x) */
00445 /*                       ( x is not equal to 0,-1,-2,תתת) */
00446 /*       Output:  GA --- ג(x) */
00447 /*       ================================================== */
00448 
00449     pi = 3.141592653589793;
00450     if (*x == (double) ((int) (*x))) {
00451         if (*x > 0.) {
00452             *ga = 1.;
00453             m1 = (int) (*x - 1);
00454             i__1 = m1;
00455             for (k = 2; k <= i__1; ++k) {
00456 /* L10: */
00457                 *ga *= k;
00458             }
00459         } else {
00460             *ga = 1e300;
00461         }
00462     } else {
00463         if (fabs(*x) > 1.) {
00464             z__ = fabs(*x);
00465             m = (int) z__;
00466             r__ = 1.;
00467             i__1 = m;
00468             for (k = 1; k <= i__1; ++k) {
00469 /* L15: */
00470                 r__ *= z__ - k;
00471             }
00472             z__ -= m;
00473         } else {
00474             z__ = *x;
00475         }
00476         gr = g[25];
00477         for (k = 25; k >= 1; --k) {
00478 /* L20: */
00479             gr = gr * z__ + g[k - 1];
00480         }
00481         *ga = 1. / (gr * z__);
00482         if (fabs(*x) > 1.) {
00483             *ga *= r__;
00484             if (*x < 0.) {
00485                 *ga = -pi / (*x * *ga * sin(pi * *x));
00486             }
00487         }
00488     }
00489     return 0;
00490 } /* gamma_ */

00494 void SGP_Funs(  float*  fz,     float*  fR0,    float*  fsigma, float* fni, float* funs)
00495 {
00496         double  z               =       (double)*fz;
00497         double  R0              =       (double)*fR0;
00498         double  sigma   =       (double)*fsigma;
00499         double  ni              =       (double)*fni + 1.0;
00500 
00501         double  u               =       R0 - z;
00502         double  zeta    =       u / sigma;
00503 
00504         *funs = 0.0f;
00505 
00506         if(zeta > -5.0 && zeta < 10){
00507                 double  tmp1    =       1.0 / (sqrt(2.0 * pi) * sigma);
00508                 double  tmp2    =       exp(-1.0 * u * u / (4.0 * sigma * sigma)) * pow(sigma, ni);
00509                 double  tmp3;
00510                 gamma_(&ni, &tmp3);
00511                 double  tmp4;
00512                 double  y               =       -1.0 * ni;
00513                 double  x               =       -1.0 * zeta;
00514                 SGP_Dyx(&y, &x, &tmp4);
00515 
00516                 double  result  =       tmp1 * tmp2 * tmp3 * tmp4;
00517                 *funs                   =       (float)result;}
00518 
00519         if(zeta >= 10.0){
00520                 *funs                   =       pow(u, ni - 1.0);}
00521 }
